title: Minimal Investment in ICT Public-Private Partnerships
description: In 2019, Belize recorded an investment of $8.6 million in public-private partnerships for ICT, one of the lowest globally.

title: Low Number of Children Living with HIV
description: As of 2022, Belize had 100 children aged 0-14 living with HIV, reflecting one of the lowest figures worldwide.

title: Negligible High-Technology Exports
description: In 2022, Belize's high-technology exports were valued at just $17, marking one of the lowest contributions globally.

title: Minimal Contribution of High-Tech Exports to Manufacturing
description: High-technology exports constituted a mere 0.00018% of Belize's manufactured exports in 2022, one of the lowest percentages worldwide.
